actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat certain uses of public law enforcement and other vehicles as nontaxable fringe benefits.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to treat as nontaxable fringe benefits the use by an eligible employee of law enforcement, firefighting, or emergency medical services vehicles to transport him or her to and from the employee's home and the place at which the vehicle is usually stationed.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat certain uses of public law enforcement and other vehicles as nontaxable fringe benefits.
